titleStmt.title: The form of consecration of a church or chappel. And of the place of Christian buriall. / Exemplified by the R.R.F. in God, Lancelot late lord-bishop of Winchester, in the consecration of the Chappel of Jesus in the foresaid diocess.
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Sold by T. Garthwait at the little North-door of S. Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
